targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(Datetime,$__interval) AS "time",
  count(controller_worker) as 'fort: workers',
  sum(loc_time)/sum(loc_success) AS "fort: Location handling time",
  sum(loc_count) AS "fort: Locations handled",
  100*sum(loc_success)/sum(loc_count) AS "fort: Location success rate",
  sum(gmos) as "fort: total GMOs",
  sum(retries) as "fort: retries",
  sum(timeElapsed)/sum(loc_count) as "fort: proto time",
  sum(locationDelay)/(sum(locationDelay)+sum(timeElapsed)) as "fort: rate location delay",
  (0.25*(sum(retries)-sum(gmoNoCell)))/(sum(locationDelay)+sum(timeElapsed)) as "fort: rate gmo no pokemon delay",
  (0.5*sum(gmoNoCell))/(sum(locationDelay)+sum(timeElapsed)) as "fort: rate gmo no cell delay",
  (sum(timeElapsed)-(0.5*sum(gmoNoCell))-(0.25*(sum(retries)-sum(gmoNoCell))))/(sum(locationDelay)+sum(timeElapsed)) as "fort: real proto time",
  sum(gmoGivingUp) as "fort: GMO giving up",
  (sum(gmo0fail)-sum(gmo1fail))/sum(gmo0fail) as 'GMO success after retry #1',
  (sum(gmo1fail)-sum(gmo2fail))/sum(gmo0fail) as '#2',
  (sum(gmo2fail)-sum(gmo3fail))/sum(gmo0fail) as '#3',
  (sum(gmo3fail)-sum(gmo4fail))/sum(gmo0fail) as '#4',
  (sum(gmo4fail)-sum(gmo5fail))/sum(gmo0fail) as '#5',
  (sum(gmo5fail)-sum(gmo6fail))/sum(gmo0fail) as '#6',
  (sum(gmo6fail)-sum(gmo7fail))/sum(gmo0fail) as '#7',
  (sum(gmo7fail)-sum(gmo8fail))/sum(gmo0fail) as '#8',
  100*sum(gmoInitialSuccess)/sum(loc_count) as 'fort: gmo initial success rate',
  100*sum(gmoGivingUp)/sum(loc_count) as 'fort: gmo failure rate'
FROM stats_worker
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Datetime) and
  RPL='$RPL' and
  controller_worker in ($drago_worker)
GROUP BY 1  
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(Datetime,$__interval)

names: fort: rate gmo no pokemon delay
fort: rate gmo no cell delay

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(Datetime,$__interval) as 'time',
  sum(modeLocations) as 'fort mode locations handled',
  sum(fetchRaid) as 'raid locations handled',
  sum(fortLookup) as 'fort lookups',
  sum(totalProtoTimeFort)/sum(modeLocations) as 'fort mode location handling time (ms)',
  sum(totalProtoTimeRaid)/sum(fetchRaid) as 'raid location handling time (ms)'

FROM stats_worker_fort
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) and
  RPL = '$RPL' AND
  worker in ($drago_worker) 
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(Datetime,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(Datetime,$__interval) as 'time',
  scanMin/60000 as 'min',
  scanMax/60000 as 'max',
  scanAvg/60000 as 'average',
  raidMin/60000 as 'min time left',
  raidMax/60000 as 'max time left',
  raidAvg/60000 as 'average time left',
  raidActiveMin,
  raidActiveMax,
  raidActiveAvg,
  raidQueueMin,
  raidQueueMax,
  raidQueueAvg

FROM stats_prioraid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) and
  RPL = '$RPL' 
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(Datetime,$__interval)

panels.title: Raid scanned within x minutes of hatch/seen

list.definition: select controller_worker from stats_worker where rpl=5 and  datetime>now() - interval 30 day and mode = 'FortMode';
list.name: drago_worker
